title: Large De-leaded,  4 Bedroom apt. Heat & Hot Water inc- 38 Salem St
posting_body: Available is a Large De-leaded apartments 4 Bedroom apt.
Heat and Hot Water included - 38 Salem St
4br - 975ft2 - Large 4 bedroom De-leaded, Heat & Hot Water Included - 38 Salem St
The apartment has been redone with new kitchen cabinets.
It is located on the 3rd floor and is available 1/15/22.
Apartment is a spacious de-leaded 4 bed apartment located on the secure quiet building located 38 Salem Street now available.
There are 5 bright and sunny rooms in unit.
Apartments include Heat, Hot Water.
We provide 24 hour maintenance, each apartment comes with one assigned off street parking space (with additional possible), natural hard wood floors, coin-op laundry facility on ground floor.
The pictures are of another apartment that it is similar to units available in the same building.
We are asking $2,400.00 per month rent.
We pay trash, city water, heat and hot water.
Tenant pays only for electric lights and outlets and gas stove.
We provide stove/ range and refrigerator.
There are multiple coin-op washer / dryers located on the 1st floor street level / office door that faces the street.
Close to everything!
Public Transportation, bus, train, downtown Salem, Salem State, Pickering Wharf, restaurants, and shopping.
Location of building is at 38 Salem St. Salem Ma 01970
Best time to call is 11am - 3pm, Monday - Friday or email anytime for more information.
If you email... make sure you put in the subject line "38 Salem St Apt" (we have multiple units).
Showings will be held to one group at a time.
There is an application which requires approx.
3- 4 days to run.
Equal Housing Opportunities
Section 8 Approved No dogs so please don't ask.
One Cat ok.
Pictures of rooms are possibly a different unit/ given for example of approx.
size only.

four bed room apartment apartments available Salem
